bib.title: Combining polish morphosyntactic taggers
bib.author: {\'S}niatowski, Tomasz and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.venue: International Joint Conferences on Security and …
bib.abstract: This paper describes work on the construction of a morpho-syntactic tagger for Polish as an ensemble of the best performing Polish taggers: TaKIPI and Pantera. The tagger set was extended with RFTagger trained on the Polish corpus. Several methods of ensemble
bib.booktitle: International Joint Conferences on Security and Intelligent Information Systems
